localised_description.last_approved_text: Time can mend trauma of the mind but it takes the art of a healer to mend a broken body.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Time can mend trauma of the mind but it takes the art of a healer to mend a broken body.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To accumulate, one has to speculate, and very little here has been ventured!

effect_bundles.localised_description: To accumulate, one has to speculate, and very little here has been ventured!

localised_description.last_approved_text: What is nurtured may grow, and indeed your investments now begin to take flight!

effect_bundles.localised_description: What is nurtured may grow, and indeed your investments now begin to take flight!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Investment, wisely placed, brings exponential returns!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Investment, wisely placed, brings exponential returns!

localised_description.last_approved_text: What money cannot buy is not worth owning.

effect_bundles.localised_description: What money cannot buy is not worth owning.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wealth is power.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Wealth is power.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This army enjoys the benefits of abundant military supplies.

effect_bundles.localised_description: This army enjoys the benefits of abundant military supplies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A lack of military supplies will lead to forces suffering from attrition.

effect_bundles.localised_description: A lack of military supplies will lead to forces suffering from attrition.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Military supplies are low.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The lay of the land is well known and those fighting to protect it know what is at stake.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The lay of the land is well known and those fighting to protect it know what is at stake.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The lay of the land is well known and those fighting to protect it know what is at stake.

effect_bundles.localised_description: The lay of the land is well known and those fighting to protect it know what is at stake.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One should see nothing improper, hear nothing improper, say nothing improper, do nothing improper.

effect_bundles.localised_description: One should see nothing improper, hear nothing improper, say nothing improper, do nothing improper.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are reputed for your honesty and conviction; your counsel is heard and strongly considered.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are reputed for your honesty and conviction; your counsel is heard and strongly considered.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your integrity is beyond reproach; throughout the realm you are respected by friend and foe alike.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your integrity is beyond reproach; throughout the realm you are respected by friend and foe alike.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To govern others one must first learn to govern oneself.

effect_bundles.localised_description: To govern others one must first learn to govern oneself.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Yours is a heart of virtue and collected calm; your qualities as a leader inspire and motivate your people.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Yours is a heart of virtue and collected calm; your qualities as a leader inspire and motivate your people.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your reputation walks before you – there is no man, woman or child in China who has not heard of your fury and your talents.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your reputation walks before you – there is no man, woman or child in China who has not heard of your fury and your talents.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When you roar, enemies tremble. Your strength is legendary, from the highest mountain the lowest valley.

effect_bundles.localised_description: When you roar, enemies tremble. Your strength is legendary, from the highest mountain the lowest valley.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You snap at the heels of your would-be oppressor, yet you are a nuisance – nothing more.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You snap at the heels of your would-be oppressor, yet you are a nuisance – nothing more.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have fought your way to recognition, but there is much more yet to do before they fear you.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have fought your way to recognition, but there is much more yet to do before they fear you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Worried whispers of your strength and might carry across China – it is your name that gives them pause!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Worried whispers of your strength and might carry across China – it is your name that gives them pause!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Talk of the Bandit Queen strikes fear into the hearts of nobles and peasants alike – they dread your coming storm!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Talk of the Bandit Queen strikes fear into the hearts of nobles and peasants alike – they dread your coming storm!

localised_description.last_approved_text: All of China knows your strength and your brilliance – you have risen from nothing to claim everything; you have become a legend!

effect_bundles.localised_description: All of China knows your strength and your brilliance – you have risen from nothing to claim everything; you have become a legend!

localised_description.last_approved_text: More bark than bite, your words are dismissed as empty threats.

effect_bundles.localised_description: More bark than bite, your words are dismissed as empty threats.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Word of your brutality and malice precedes you - lesser men are cowed by your might.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Word of your brutality and malice precedes you - lesser men are cowed by your might.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your wrath has seen corpse-strewn battlefields, and cities reduced to ash. Only fools would ignore your strength.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Your wrath has seen corpse-strewn battlefields, and cities reduced to ash. Only fools would ignore your strength.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Long have you been mocked, dismissed and ignored; will you languish in lowliness forever?

effect_bundles.localised_description: Long have you been mocked, dismissed and ignored; will you languish in lowliness forever?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Through determined effort, you have made yourself worthy of acknowledgement.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Through determined effort, you have made yourself worthy of acknowledgement.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are finally given the respect you deserve – China knows of your efforts, and through fear or love, they approve.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are finally given the respect you deserve – China knows of your efforts, and through fear or love, they approve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are few who now question your heavenly mandate; complete rule over China, and unlimited power, are finally within reach.

effect_bundles.localised_description: There are few who now question your heavenly mandate; complete rule over China, and unlimited power, are finally within reach.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are descended from a distinguished, centuries-old family, but what have you contributed to its legacy?

effect_bundles.localised_description: You are descended from a distinguished, centuries-old family, but what have you contributed to its legacy?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Through words and deeds, your reputation as the true successor of the Yuan has been established!

effect_bundles.localised_description: Through words and deeds, your reputation as the true successor of the Yuan has been established!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Long after your time is done, the scribes of future generations will still be celebrating your legacy.

effect_bundles.localised_description: Long after your time is done, the scribes of future generations will still be celebrating your legacy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is greater unity to be found, but you must strive for it!

effect_bundles.localised_description: There is greater unity to be found, but you must strive for it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: If earnest desire cannot unify your people, then a common goal and a common threat will.

effect_bundles.localised_description: If earnest desire cannot unify your people, then a common goal and a common threat will.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have found a driving force for yourself and your followers, who now find harmony in their beliefs and ideals.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You have found a driving force for yourself and your followers, who now find harmony in their beliefs and ideals.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You and your followers have found unity through ideals and peace through purpose.

effect_bundles.localised_description: You and your followers have found unity through ideals and peace through purpose.
